blog.name: ao3feed-yoonseok
blog.title: Hwagae Market
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jung Hoseok|J-Hope/Min Yoongi|Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Don't Leave Me
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2tBFRFD

by Siuri1322

Feelings can change, people can change. You never know how someone truly feels, even if you are married. But always look for the signs.

title: Moondust
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2tAmihd

by Shanubi


“Don’t let this be the end”

A Fantasy - AU in which two lovers end up fighting against each other.

My wings shall reach over the sea.
In a world where no one cried.
Praying the gods set us free.
As you stand by my side.
Loudly has the darkness spoken.
Take my life, if you need.
The love and trust that’s been broken.
Your name I whisper as we bleed.

Wattpad: @Shanubi
Twitter: @Shanubi1

Words: 5270, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

blog.name: yoonminjin
blog.title: Jamais Vu
blog.description:
Mari • Gifs • Networks
If we could turn back the clock, where should we go back to? Once we reach that place, can all our mistakes and errors be undone? Will happiness be ours to stay?

by Shanubi


“Don’t let this be the end”

A Fantasy - AU in which two lovers end up fighting against each other.

My wings shall reach over the sea.
In a world where no one cried.
Praying the gods set us free.
As you stand by my side.
Loudly has the darkness spoken.
Take my life, if you need.
The love and trust that’s been broken.
Your name I whisper as we bleed.

Twitter: @Shanubi1

summary: Hari Berganti dan Musim Berubah / Goresan Pena Terbit Pt. 3
title: Hari Berganti dan Musim Berubah / Goresan Pena Terbit Pt. 3
body:
Seperti hari-hari yang terus berganti, dan musim yang terus berubah..

Masihkah kau berada disana? Atau mencari tempat berlindung yang baru?

Aku merindukanmu..

Aku merindukanmu..

Aku merindukanmu..

Apakah kau yang berubah atau.. aku?

Aku membenci saat-saat seperti ini

Kita berubah seperti yang kau ketahui

Ya. Aku membencimu. Kau meninggalkanku.

Tapi aku tidak pernah berhenti memikirkanmu, bahkan seharipun..

Kau tahu semua itu

Kau adalah sahabat terbaikku..

Di pagi hari yang akan datang

Tanpa kegelapan, tanpa musim yang tidak dapat berakhir selamanya..

Tunggu aku sebentar lagi

Hanya beberapa malam lagi..

Aku akan disana untuk melihatmu..

Aku akan datang untukmu..

Sampai hari-hari dimana bunga bermekaran..

Tolong tetap tinggal..

Tolong tetap disini sedikit lebih lama..



-

(Penggalan kalimat diatas didasari oleh lagu Spring Day-BTS)

summary:
“there’s a difference,” he muttered, “between living and just existing.”
i blinked slowly at him.
“that doesn’t mean you’re...
body:
“there’s a difference,” he muttered, “between living and just existing.”

i blinked slowly at him.

“that doesn’t mean you’re limited to one of those options your entire life.”

blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jeon Jungkook/Min Yoongi | Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

summary: is my bts masterlist getting too long??? 🤔🤔🤔
title: is my bts masterlist getting too long??? 🤔🤔🤔

summary: » @9empo hi, could I please request a personality ship for bts, exo and nine percent ? I’m short, wear glasses and have blue...
body:
» @9empo hi, could I please request a personality ship for bts, exo and nine percent ? I’m short, wear glasses and have blue eyes and I’m rather shy but once I open up to someone, I can talk a lot. I can have a bit of a temper when people disagree with me on a subject that is important to me or when they joke about my insecurities. I am usually very compassionate and sensitive although most people tend to see me as only calm, smart and serious. However, I’m very introverted and  like to spend most of my time home, and prefer to stay close to my family. I’m really passionate about my interests and determined but am also very insecure and have anxiety. I blush easily and am slightly clumsy, which often makes my friends and family poke fun at me. I prefer staying home and enjoy reading, listening to music and watching TV shows.I sometimes write, when I put my mind up to it. I also spend a lot of time daydreaming and reflect on the past quite often, as I’m rather nostalgic and scared of the future. I actually enjoy spending time with people who are the opposite of me and who are rather confident or loud, because they often make me forget about my stress and make me laugh and have fun. «

Thanks in advance 😊

﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏
Thank you for requesting!
(sorry for the very late reply! ;( )

In Bts I ship you with Namjoon

In Nine Percent I ship you with Zhengting

In Exo I ship you with Baekhyun

Feel free to request again! ♡

body:
